original_title:
President Trump just revealed that during the negotiations, one of the leaders asked him to meet again on the war in "a month or two..."

..."I said, 'A MONTH OR TWO? You're going to have another 40K people DEAD! You have to do it TONIGHT."
  — The Donald
article_summary: President Trump revealed a leader asked for a meeting on the war in a month or two, but Trump insisted on immediate action due to the potential loss of 40,000 lives.</s>
